sql.query:
SELECT user_mobile, scheme_id, balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */

SELECT m_commission.comm_per, m_commission.comm_val, m_commission.service_charge_per, m_commission.service_charge_val, 
m_commission.operator_id, m_op.service_id, ma.id as api_id 
FROM m_commission
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS m_op ON (m_op.id = m_commission.operator_id) 
LEFT JOIN m_service AS m_service ON (m_service.id = m_op.service_id) 
LEFT JOIN m_api AS ma ON (ma.api_code = @api_code)
where m_op.operator_name = @op_name AND m_commission.scheme_id = @scheme AND m_service.service_name = @service_name;

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountId
FROM dmt_beneficiary
WHERE remitter_id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.VerifyRemMobile}} */ AND ben_id = :P2 /* {{$_POST.VerifyBenId}} */

values.value: {{'Transfer of Rs. '+Amount+' by '+GetUser.user_mobile+'  and Benef. Id '+$_POST.VerifyBenId+' for Money Transfer Verification | Net Amt. '+RTPayableAmt}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO tt_recharge_trans
(op_id, service_id, api_id, user_id, user_number, details, opening_balance, amount, comm_per, comm_val, comm_amt, other_charge, charge_per, charge_amt, net_amt, closing_balance, tr_mode, tr_type, status, tr_id, reason, ip_address, process_mode, live, tr_date, transaction_by, dtcommper, dtcommval, dtcommamt, dtchargeper, dtchargeval, dtchargeamt, mdtcommper, mdtcommval, mdtcommamt, mdtchargeper, mdtchargeval, mdtchargeamt, remitter_id, bank_ac_no) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetComm[0].operator_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetComm[0].service_id}} */, :P3 /* {{GetComm[0].api_id}} */, :P4 /* {{identity}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.VerifyBenAcNo}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.VerifyBenId}} */, :P7 /* {{GetUser.balance_amt}} */, :P8 /* {{Amount}} */, :P9 /* {{GetComm[0].comm_per}} */, :P10 /* {{GetComm[0].comm_val}} */, :P11 /* {{RTCommAmt}} */, :P12 /* {{GetComm[0].service_charge_val}} */, :P13 /* {{GetComm[0].service_charge_per}} */, :P14 /* {{RTChargeAmt}} */, :P15 /* {{RTPayableAmt}} */, :P16 /* {{RTClosingBalance.toNumber()}} */, :P17 /* {{'Web'}} */, :P18 /* {{'Cash'}} */, :P19 /* {{'Pending'}} */, :P20 /* {{TransactionId}} */, :P21 /* {{'Transfer of Rs. '+Amount+' by '+GetUser.user_mobile+'  and Benef. Id '+$_POST.VerifyBenId+' for Money Transfer Verification | Net Amt. '+RTPayableAmt}} */, :P22 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P23 /* {{'A2P'}} */, :P24 /* {{'Live'}} */, :P25 /* {{NOW}} */, :P26 /* {{identity}} */, :P27 /* {{0}} */, :P28 /* {{0}} */, :P29 /* {{0}} */, :P30 /* {{0}} */, :P31 /* {{0}} */, :P32 /* {{0}} */, :P33 /* {{0}} */, :P34 /* {{0}} */, :P35 /* {{0}} */, :P36 /* {{0}} */, :P37 /* {{0}} */, :P38 /* {{0}} */, :P39 /* {{$_POST.VerifyRemMobile}} */, :P40 /* {{$_POST.VerifyBenAcNo}} */)

params.name: :P21
params.value: {{'Transfer of Rs. '+Amount+' by '+GetUser.user_mobile+'  and Benef. Id '+$_POST.VerifyBenId+' for Money Transfer Verification | Net Amt. '+RTPayableAmt}}

values.value: {{'Number: '+GetUser.user_mobile+' | Amount: Rs. '+Amount+' | Verify Money Transfer | Ref. Id: '+RechTrans.identity+' | Comm Per: '+GetComm[0].comm_per+' | Comm Val: '+GetComm[0].comm_val+' | Charge Per: '+GetComm[0].service_charge_per+' | Charge Val: '+GetComm[0].service_charge_val+' | GST: 00.00 | TDS: 00.00 | Net Amt.: '+RTPayableAmt+' | Beneficiary Id:  '+$_POST.VerifyBenId+' | Remitter Mobile:  '+$_POST.VerifyRemMobile}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO tt_balance
(user_id, old_balance, amount, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on, netamt, status) VALUES (:P1 /* {{identity}} */, :P2 /* {{GetUser.balance_amt.toNumber()}} */, :P3 /* {{Amount}} */, :P4 /* {{RTClosingBalance.toNumber()}} */, :P5 /* {{'Money Transfer Verify'}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, :P7 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P8 /* {{'Debit'}} */, :P9 /* {{RechTrans.identity}} */, :P10 /* {{'Number: '+GetUser.user_mobile+' | Amount: Rs. '+Amount+' | Verify Money Transfer | Ref. Id: '+RechTrans.identity+' | Comm Per: '+GetComm[0].comm_per+' | Comm Val: '+GetComm[0].comm_val+' | Charge Per: '+GetComm[0].service_charge_per+' | Charge Val: '+GetComm[0].service_charge_val+' | GST: 00.00 | TDS: 00.00 | Net Amt.: '+RTPayableAmt+' | Beneficiary Id:  '+$_POST.VerifyBenId+' | Remitter Mobile:  '+$_POST.VerifyRemMobile}} */, :P11 /* {{identity}} */, :P12 /* {{NOW}} */, :P13 /* {{RTPayableAmt}} */, :P14 /* {{'FAILED'}} */)

params.name: :P10
params.value: {{'Number: '+GetUser.user_mobile+' | Amount: Rs. '+Amount+' | Verify Money Transfer | Ref. Id: '+RechTrans.identity+' | Comm Per: '+GetComm[0].comm_per+' | Comm Val: '+GetComm[0].comm_val+' | Charge Per: '+GetComm[0].service_charge_per+' | Charge Val: '+GetComm[0].service_charge_val+' | GST: 00.00 | TDS: 00.00 | Net Amt.: '+RTPayableAmt+' | Beneficiary Id:  '+$_POST.VerifyBenId+' | Remitter Mobile:  '+$_POST.VerifyRemMobile}}

sql.query:
UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{apistatus}} */, api_logs = :P2 /* {{'DMEP'}} */, is_processed = :P3 /* {{VerifyTrId}} */, operator_ref = :P4 /* {{VerifyMessage}} */, api_ref = :P5 /* {{VerifyTrId}} */, revert_trans = '0', api_response_id = :P6 /* {{apiResponseTime}} */, updated_on = :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, bank_ac_no = :P8 /* {{VerifyACNo}} */
WHERE id = :P9 /* {{RechTrans.identity}} */

UPDATE tt_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{apistatus}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{DrBalanceRT.identity}} */

UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{identity}} */

UPDATE dmt_beneficiary
SET ben_verify = :P1 /* {{true}} */, updated_by = :P2 /* {{identity}} */, updated_on = :P3 /* {{NOW}} */, aadhar_no = :P4 /* {{$_POST.VerifyAadharBenef}} */, pan_no = :P5 /* {{$_POST.VerifyPANBenef}} */
WHERE remitter_id = :P6 /* {{$_POST.VerifyRemMobile}} */ AND ben_id = :P7 /* {{$_POST.VerifyBenId}} */

INSERT INTO dmt_beneficiary
(remitter_id, ben_id, ben_name, ben_mobile, ben_ac_no, ben_ifsc, ben_bankname, ben_verify, status, created_by, created_on, aadhar_no, pan_no) VALUES (:P1 /* {{$_POST.VerifyRemMobile}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.VerifyBenId}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.VerifyBenName}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.VerifyRemMobile}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.VerifyBenAcNo}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.VerifyBenIFSC}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.VerifyBenBankName}} */, :P8 /* {{true}} */, :P9 /* {{'Active'}} */, :P10 /* {{identity}} */, :P11 /* {{NOW}} */, :P12 /* {{$_POST.VerifyAadharBenef}} */, :P13 /* {{$_POST.VerifyPANBenef}} */)

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET closing_balance = :P1 /* {{balance}} */, status = :P2 /* {{'FAILED'}} */, api_logs = :P3 /* {{'DMEP'}} */, api_response_id = :P4 /* {{apiResponseTime}} */, api_ref = :P5 /* {{VerifyTrId}} */, operator_ref = :P6 /* {{VerifyMessage}} */, revert_trans = '1', updated_on = :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, extra2 = :P8 /* {{VerifyACNo}} */
WHERE id = :P9 /* {{RechTrans.identity}} */

values.value: {{'Number:  '+GetUser.user_mobile+' | Amount: Rs. '+Amount+' | Verify Money Transfer | Ref.
